entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:24 a.m. MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 1:00 PM CDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 48 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: SSE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Blizzard developing before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 80 gusting to 100 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
